attributes.action: Pay a basic income for the next 6 month.
attributes.additional_details: We need help IMMEDIATELY! Not as a loan, but as a subsidy for sales and income that suddenly disappeared within days.The UK is a rich country. What would help the country is the introduction of an unconditional basic income of £ 800-1200 per person for 6 months. Fast, unbureaucratic, limited in time. THIS would prevent the social crash of thousands while maintaining purchasing power in the country. There is no better way to test the basic income concept - the greatest chance lies in the crisis.
attributes.background: My name is Martin and I’ve been running my own business for the past 10 years. I don't have any savings. This goes for countless self-employed people, creative people, artists, organisers and survivors.People who have always shaped their own lives, who shape the UK and make our world more colourful.
